remarks: Commutative/associative law for commutative rings.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.)
statement:
crngm.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
crngm.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
crngm.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
crngm23 $p |- ( ( R e. CRingOps /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A H B ) H C ) = ( ( A H C ) H B ) ) $.
